metadata.description: Used to set the Keyvault access policy - run this command using az cli to get your ObjectID : az ad signed-in-user show --query objectId -o tsv
Set the resource group name, this will be created automatically
Set the size for the supporting VMs (jump servers, domain controller etc)
Set the name of the domain eg contoso.local
AKS network Plugin - kubenet or azure (azure deploys Container Networking Interface (CNI)

onpremSubnetRef.value: [format('{0}/subnets/{1}', reference(extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', subscription().subscriptionId, parameters('ResourceGroupName')), 'Microsoft.Resources/deployments', format('{0}', variables('env')[parameters('networkPlugin')].vnets[2].vnetName))).outputs.vnid.value, reference(extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', subscription().subscriptionId, parameters('ResourceGroupName')), 'Microsoft.Resources/deployments', format('{0}', variables('env')[parameters('networkPlugin')].vnets[2].vnetName))).outputs.subnets.value[0].name)]
